title: Hits - Digital Sports Coach
summary: The digital coach for sports.  Measures your speed as you play sports.
developerAddress:
101 College Street, Suite #320,
Toronto, ON
Canada
description: It's a simple way to capture and measure your speed with Android Wear.  Use with any sport. Left your radar gun at home?  Forgot to order your $20,000 motion capture camera?  No problem.  Whether it’s your basketball shot, golf swing or tennis backhand, figure out how fast you’re going.  Watch your progress as you get stronger and more consistent.  Just start playing, the app will pick up your motion and score you automatically in miles per hour.  It’s that easy, so go ahead and try it out.  Start a contest.  Learn something new.  We’re here to be a part of your greatest hits.From the digital coaching experts at Onyx Motion (www.onyxmotion.com)Features• Automatic shot detection• Scoring in Miles per Hour (mph)• Works for basketball, golf, tennis, and more• Compatible with Samsung Galaxy Gear Live, LG G Watch, and Moto 360• Includes a watch face
descriptionHTML:
It's a simple way to capture and measure your speed with Android Wear. Use with any sport.

Left your radar gun at home? Forgot to order your $20,000 motion capture camera? No problem. Whether it’s your basketball shot, golf swing or tennis backhand, figure out how fast you’re going. Watch your progress as you get stronger and more consistent.

Just start playing, the app will pick up your motion and score you automatically in miles per hour. It’s that easy, so go ahead and try it out. Start a contest. Learn something new. We’re here to be a part of your greatest hits.

From the digital coaching experts at Onyx Motion (www.onyxmotion.com)

Features

• Automatic shot detection
• Scoring in Miles per Hour (mph)
• Works for basketball, golf, tennis, and more
• Compatible with Samsung Galaxy Gear Live, LG G Watch, and Moto 360
• Includes a watch face
comments: Fun and useful wear app! Very cool app, can't wait to see what new apps the developer makes
recentChanges: Support for Moto360 and round watches.
